Thank you for your application
We are now processing your application and we will contact you by the end of Friday 6th February to let you know if you have been successful in getting to the next stage.
If you are successful, we will invite you to an assessment event happening between 14 and 22 February 2015.
Please note that this is the last assessment for Step Forward candidates this year.

Best of luck with your application!
